item.title: 【Requests】[REQ CAP] - What about making a streaming service website?
item.description:
Can someone make a streaming service website that asks about Sharemania because most of the links on Google Drive or Mega are broken?

I think it would be good because all of you get to make a site and add your favourite Nickelodeon and Disney channels. Other movies and TV shows from different companies. Just one click away, you can watch it on demand.


All of you guys can work together to make a website. There are Icarly and Victorious, Zoey 101, and Drake and Josh. I think about making streaming service available on demand in HD.

annoyed when the link doesn't work anymore. After too many requests, why not make a website streaming service?



What about jellyfin or plex?
item.author: Go 101
